website_summaries.verdict: The German brand’s most famous and bestselling classic sneakers get an updated look in the Puma Suede Classic Anodized. A noteworthy steal for its $70 suggested retail price, this daily essential sneaker retains its smooth and supple suede upper with a comfortable rubber midsole and outsole.Great for pairing with casual street-style clothes, the Puma Suede Classic Anodized is a versatile choice for those who want a minimalist look amidst all the hype and overbearing iterations of some classic sneakers today.
pros: Some users find this basic and classic looking sneaker easy to style and wear with casual clothing
Some reviewers disclosed the Puma Suede Classic Anodized has an updated dressier look that makes it stylish and fashionable for any occasion
The metallic finish at the back heel and the anodized finish of the suede upper looks modern and crisp some buyers noted
Some users like the thick soles because of its durability and protect the feet from impact in hard surfaces
A significant number of customers commented that this classic sneaker is comfortable even without the high end cushioning that are common in other bestselling brands
A few reviewers noted how the Puma Suede Classic Anodized is well-built and doesn’t break down after only a few months of use
Some users use this low-top sneaker for daily activities like at work or at school because of its versatility in styling and long-lasting comfort
A couple of regular Puma sneakerheads bought these shoes to add to their existing collection
The soft suede uppers are smooth and well-constructed with every stitch and detail in place, one reviewer noted
cons: Several buyers found the Puma Suede Classic Anodized a tad narrow than their usual size from the brand
Some customers noted that colors vary from those they see online
A few observers noted there is no significant update to this sneaker regarding comfort except for a few upper look improvements

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes basic is better
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of sneakers, sometimes basic is better. The only complaint I have is that these sneakers look darker online, they are actually a shade lighter which threw me off and it’s a little had to match with most of my navy blues but it’s cool. I figure out something. Otherwise I’d give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice color - good price
customer_reviews.text: Name brand shoes, in a unusual color, accurately described, fairly priced, well packed and promptly shipped. What more can you ask!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: They're puma...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes. They run a tad small. I would suggest sizing up a half size. They're also narrow. If you have wide feet, these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: JenaFay

customer_reviews.title: Lools cool, narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a little bit narrow. I still wear the shoes the lool cool. They just arent the my go to when Im looking to kick back in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: PNWDane

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new shoes and says they’re really comfortable. Also I think he looks really cute in them. Great all around!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit just like my other Puma suede shoes. I like the Tibetian red color. It's very red but not clown shoes red if that makes sense. A dull soft red color. Great for my collection.
customer_reviews.author: ColdestRainEver

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love some suede pumas?
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly and shoes were perfect. They usually only last a season and one bad rain will put them to an end real quick. But you can’t ask for anything better. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the Puma retro look with a contemporary flair. The monochrome color is wild.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: They are still pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little brighter than I thought they would be in natural light. They are still pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J Drake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome job with delivering package. Love the photo to prove package was delivered. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1/2 size bigger based on other reviews and they fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Found a sock in one of the shoes!!! And damaged package! Called for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Suede Classic Anodized Sneaker
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the success of the german sports brand. This latest update offers an anodized spray on the tooling as well as a metallic finish on the heel cap.
